attributes.action: Make masks/face shields mandatory for everyone
attributes.additional_details: To stop the spread of the virus and get people to listen
attributes.background: Due to the virus spreading quickly we should make it law to make masks/face visors mandatory. I believe this will help towards the stop of the virus to some extent. Too many people walking around like nothings wrong and saying they are exempt. This needs to stop!

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions which call for similar actions: 

Make face-masks mandatory in all public spaces - indoors and out: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/554917

Require people exempt from wearing face coverings to wear a face shield: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555541
